data.title: John Grose: Revenue, Competitors, Alternatives
data.meta_description: John Grose top competitors are EDAM Group, Charge RandD and Drover and they have annual revenue of $51.9M  and 143  employees.
data.text:
We are a multi-franchise, family owned motor dealer group based in East Anglia, and are proud to have won a number of awards for our customer satisfaction, including the Ford 'Chairman's Award', more times than any other dealer in the UK. 

We offer the full Ford, Peugeot, Citroen, DS & Kia car ranges, as well as Ford, Peugeot & Citroen vans and a comprehensive range of used cars & vans including ex-demonstration vehicles.

Short & long term car & van hire is available from our Ipswich and Framlingham dealerships, and all sites offer a competitive range of vehicle finance options on site for your next vehicle, whether you are looking to buy privately or through your business.

We can arrange vehicle livery, ply-lining, tow-bars etc for you on site, and we deliver nationwide through our dedicated Business Centre team.

A full aftersales service is available at all of our sites for the servicing, MOT and repair of your vehicle, whatever the make and model. Class 7 MOT's are available at our Ransomes Europark deaklership in Ipswich, where we also have a separate Accident Repair centre which undertakes insurance company and private work.

We pride ourselves on doing all we can to make your life easier, such as overnight vehicle servicing (so your company doesn't have a vehicle off the road during normal working hours), a collection and delivery service and courtesy cars and vans.
